articles.title: Immune system ‘remembers’ to fight off coronavirus for at least 6 months: study - The Times of Israel
articles.description: Research by UN and Switzerland shows that even though the level of antibodies fade, body maintains sufficient memory B cells, and they manage to stave off reinfection
